CHANGES
=======


1.1.0 (2010-05-21)
------------------

- Fixed tests
- The wrapper now uses a path relative to its location to invoke a script


1.0.1 (2009-12-15)
------------------

- Re-release.


1.0.0 (2008-09-03)
------------------

- First Open Source release.


1.0.0a1 (2008-08-28)
--------------------

- First internal release
